author: Woody Allen
quote: If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right.

author: Henry Ford
quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.

author: Martin Luther King Jr
quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
